segments.text: Observing this line drawing, I see a classic kitchen mishap unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman stands there, apron on, focused on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is betraying her with that overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, and she's blissfully unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could lead to a nasty slip on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Shifting to the left, the boy's on that precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand in the cookie jar, plate in the other— clever kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's instability makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting expectantly, arm raised high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in on the cookie caper, no doubt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a peaceful garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and fence look so orderly compared to inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, towel bunched— details of routine life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment captures innocence mixed with impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
